title: Major difference between nominal and real GDP

content.question: The major difference between real and nominal gross domestic product (GDP) is that real GDP

choices.label: is adjusted for price-level changes using a price index
measures only the value of final goods and services that are consumed
measures the prices of a market basket of goods purchased by a typical urban consumer

content.answer: is adjusted for price-level changes using a price index
